results.title: A Targeted, Low-Throughput Compound Screen in a Drosophila Model of Neurofibromatosis Type 1 Identifies Simvastatin and BMS-204352 as Potential Therapies for Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)
results.text_hl: "We did not examine the possibility of a combinatorial effect of the compounds on @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@tactile hypersensitivity@@@, such that administering both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_BMS204352 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C424388 @@@BMS-204352@@@ simultaneously results in a stronger phenotypic rescue.

citations.NLM: Dyson A, Ryan M, Garg S, Evans DG, Baines RA. A Targeted, Low-Throughput Compound Screen in a Drosophila Model of Neurofibromatosis Type 1 Identifies Simvastatin and BMS-204352 as Potential Therapies for Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) eNeuro. 2023 May;10(5):. PMID: 37185294

results.title: A novel anti-inflammatory role of simvastatin in a murine model of allergic asthma.
results.text_hl: A novel anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergic@@@ @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@.

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on pulmonary C-fiber sensitivity in rats with monocrotaline-induced pulmonary hypertension.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment in @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@-@DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ not only attenuated @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@, but also desensitized @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@PCF hypersensitivity@@@ and decreased the production of @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@ROS@@@.

citations.NLM: Hsu HH, Ruan T, Ko WJ, Hsu JY, Chen JS, Lee YC, Lai IR, Chen CF. Effects of simvastatin on pulmonary C-fiber sensitivity in rats with monocrotaline-induced pulmonary hypertension. J Heart Lung Transplant. 2011 Mar;30(3):332-40. PMID: 21075647

results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits IL-5-Induced Chemotaxis and CCR3 Expression of HL-60-Derived and Human Primary Eosinophils
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, a @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ lowering agent, has been shown to exhibit anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and anti-@<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergic@@@ effects.

results.title: Lipid-altering efficacy and safety of ezetimibe/simvastatin versus atorvastatin in patients with hypercholesterolemia and the metabolic syndrome (from the VYMET study).
results.text_hl: The incidence of @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver, muscle, and gastrointestinal@@@-, @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatitis@@@- and @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergic reaction@@@/@DISEASE_Exanthema @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@rash@@@-related adverse events were low and generally similar to those in previous studies of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and/or @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Robinson JG, Ballantyne CM, Grundy SM, Hsueh WA, Parving HH, Rosen JB, Adewale AJ, Polis AB, Tomassini JE, Tershakovec AM.
